item.title: huban likes eating Sam's can
item.description: Huban is a big fan of Sam’s Can, so we decided to buy a whole box for him from Sam’s APP. Every time we open a can, Huban comes running and can hardly contain his excitement. It’s hilarious to watch him eagerly lick the can clean. We love seeing Huban happy and satisfied, and Sam’s Can is definitely doing the trick. It’s great to have a brand we can rely on to keep our furry friend healthy and happy.

item.title: Happy Birthday to huban
item.description: Today is huban’s birthday. We prepared a tiny cream cake (an animal friendly cake) to celebrate this moment. Our boy is three years old and he is a teenager boy now. I would like to thanks The Fate for allowing us to meet with huban. I also want to thanks huban for being stay with us for three entire years, we get even much closer. We wish our boy a happy and healthy life!
